title: Good Housemate Needed (near Red Line), Sept 1
posting_body: We have one room open in our 4 bedroom, 2 full bathroom apartment for September 1st for 1-year lease.
Rent is $700 plus utilities (gas heat, electric, and internet total $75-$150 per person depending on season).
There will be four people total living in the house and one cat (Sorry, no other pets).
The available room has a private closet that’s in the shared hallway (see photos).
This is an LGBTQ+ friendly home.
We value respectful and open communication to maintain a peaceful, shared space that we can all be comfortable in.
Because we have differing schedules, we have a check-in meeting about once a month.
You will need to share household cleaning and responsibilities, and pay your share of utility bills monthly (we use Splitwise app).
ABOUT US:
We're into biking, plants, video games, various crafts, baking, and porch hangs.
We’re in our mid 20s and early 30s, working at a museum, public library and for the EPA.
We’re a quieter house, with occasional get togethers with friends.
LOCATION:
We're located in Dorchester Center, a two minute walk to the red line.
Walking distance to restaurants, Target, a couple grocery stores and coffee shops.
Lots of trees, cool architecture, friendly neighbors and dogs on our block.
INTERESTED?
In your response, please include some details about yourself, if you've had experience living with roommates, some expectations you have for sharing a home with others, and any questions you have.
ACCESSIBILITY and MORE DETAILS:
The apartment is on the 2nd and 3rd floor of a two-family home.
It has two sets of steps outside and two flights of stairs.
Free laundry in kitchen.
Plenty of street parking, no major problems with snow, no resident sticker needed.
420 friendly, but the lease limits it to the porch/outside.
Additional rooms include an art/craft room, living room, dining room, extra living room, and attic storage space.
Early move-in available if your lease ends Aug 31st and you need a larger window of time as a human person to move your belongings.
MOVE-IN COSTS:
Move-in requires first month ($700), last month ($700), and security deposit ($225), paid through property management company's web portal that provides receipts.
You will need to submit an application to the property management company, which includes a background check, credit check and references.
